keyMappings:
# Insert your preferred key mappings here.
unmap d
map <c-d> scrollPageDown
unmap u
map <c-u> scrollPageUp
unmap J
map J nextTab
unmap K
map K previousTab
map gb visitPreviousTab
map <c-p> Vomnibar.activateInNewTab
map <c-b> Vomnibar.activateTabSelection
unmap t
unmap x
searchEngines:
w: https://www.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Special:Search&search=%s Wikipedia

# More examples.
#
# (Vimium supports search completion Wikipedia, as
# above, and for these.)
#
g: https://www.google.com/search?q=%s Google
m: https://www.google.com/maps?q=%s Google maps
j: https://cinnamon-ai.atlassian.net/secure/BrowseProjects.jspa?containls=%s Jira
c: https://cinnamon-ai.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces?search=%s Confluence
